definition: one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing heaven/male principle/☰/ancient Chinese compass point: 315° (northwest)
clean/completely/only/net (income, exports etc)/(Chinese opera) painted face male role
colloquial reading for 落[luo4] in certain compounds
to fall or drop/(of the sun) to set/(of a tide) to go out/to lower/to decline or sink/to lag or fall behind/to fall onto/to rest with/to get or receive/to write down/whereabouts/settlement
to leave out/to be missing/to leave behind or forget to bring/to lag or fall behind

sentences.english: I see pictures of small pistols, and I hope, quick and painless.
sentences.chinese: 我看到小手槍，而且我真希望，乾淨利落，豪無痛苦。

sentences.english: Lips well developed but not pendulous giving a clean finish.
sentences.chinese: 嘴脣發達但不下垂，末端乾淨利落。

sentences.english: The shot is clean, and fatal, just behind the front leg.
sentences.chinese: 這一槍乾淨利落而且致命，打在了鹿的前腿後面。

sentences.english: Auto balanced scraper ensures even pressuer;
sentences.chinese: 自動平衡之油刀，刮油乾淨利落。

sentences.english: That clear-cut position, the water raised up after the very satisfying.
sentences.chinese: 那姿勢乾淨利落，水提上來以後非常滿足。

sentences.english: The fighter neatly fended off a dangerous blow.
sentences.chinese: 拳擊手乾淨利落地擋開了危險的一擊。

sentences.english: The student gave a clear, crisp answer to the teacher's question.
sentences.chinese: 學生乾淨利落地歸答了老師白勺問題。
箭桿插在它的前胸上，一記乾淨利落的擊殺。
2他乾淨利落地解決了這個問題。

sentences.english: This will provide you with a cleaner, less painful death than you would otherwise experience.
sentences.chinese: 我的方法會比你可能經歷的各種死法都更加乾淨利落。
